items.title: Trump tightens his grip on D.C. by seizing its rail hub, stripping Amtrak of control
items.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said Union Station has “fallen into disrepair” when it should be a “point of pride” for the District of Columbia.

items.title: Trump critics inside FEMA put on indefinite leave after blasting cuts in dissent letter
items.description: More than 180 current and former FEMA employees signed the letter.

items.title: This ‘economic sugar high’ won’t last, CRFB warns, touting analysis predicting long-term stagnation and $600 billion of annual borrowing through 2028
items.description: "An economic sugar high doesn’t mean sustained growth," says the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget. This happened in 2017, too, they say.

items.title: I’m rooting for female founders’ comebacks. And for the end of branding women, from girlboss to tradwife and all the way down
items.description: Female founders have the right to come back from their mistakes.

items.title: Relieved Kohl’s investors give the stock a 20% boost—but the CEO’s plan to get ‘back to growth’ is far from a done deal
items.description: As Kohl’s embarks on its latest turnaround, the retailer’s saga remains a show-me story.
